text:
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, M ICHI GAN
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
May 22, 1959
RHONE WO
Mr. Harry J. Skornia, Exec. Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
In your letter of May 12th you request a time extension of your pro¬
ject >hich is scheduled to end June 30, 1959, but "which you wish to
continue until September 30, 1959* We are granting this request and
will consider that the last year of this current project will be a
fifteen-month period from July 1, 1958, to September 30, 1959* Your
program and financial reports for this last year will be for this
fifteen-month period.
In the same letter you request a change in your current budget which
would mean that you would take $3,868.19 from your $4,100 contingency
item and you would add the following items of expenditures:
Salary, Executive Director (2 mo. July, Aug.,1959)
Salary, Associate Director (2 mo. July, Aug.,1959)
Retirement Benefits (8.477$)
Workmen’s compensation (l$)
Total for July and August, 1959
$2,000.00
1,533*34
299*52
35.33
$3,868.19
I am now approving this second request.
Because the new commitment which we have made to the NAEB begins on
July 1, 1958, and since certain salary items will not be required for
July and August in that new program, I suggest that you submit to us
a revised 1959-80 project budget for this new program.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
MFS/fh
[aurice F. Seay
